archetypes.title: Trend Pullback
archetypes.summary: Enter with trend on dips/rallies gated by MA relation or ADX.
intent_phrases: buy the dip in an existing uptrend
enter on pullbacks during a bullish trend
sell short on rallies during a clear downtrend
enter with the dominant trend after a retracement
trade pullbacks toward a moving average in a trending market

archetypes.title: Range Mean-Reversion
archetypes.summary: Fade extremes back toward the mean within a range regime.
intent_phrases: fade the highs and lows inside a sideways range
buy near support and sell near resistance in a choppy market
mean-reversion within a clear trading range
sell when price spikes to the top of the range and buy near the bottom

archetypes.title: Breakout Trend-Follow
archetypes.summary: Enter on N-bar breakouts with optional buffer/confirm; with-trend bias.
intent_phrases: enter when price breaks out to new highs with the trend
buy breakouts above recent resistance
go short when price breaks below recent support in a downtrend
trend-following breakout entries after consolidation

archetypes.title: Breakout Retest
archetypes.summary: After a breakout, enter on retest pullback and continuation.
intent_phrases: wait for a breakout and then enter on the pullback to the breakout level
buy the retest of a broken resistance that turns into support
sell the retest of a broken support that turns into resistance
enter only after price confirms the breakout by retesting the level

archetypes.title: Squeeze → Expansion
archetypes.summary: Detect volatility compression then enter on expansion with breakout rule.
intent_phrases: enter when volatility has been very low and then suddenly expands
trade breakouts out of a tight volatility squeeze
buy when price explodes out of a narrow range after compression
enter on volatility expansion following a squeeze

archetypes.title: Cross-Sectional Momentum
archetypes.summary: Periodic rebalance into strongest names by a rank feature.
intent_phrases: allocate into the strongest performers in a basket
rebalance into top momentum coins or stocks
periodically buy the assets with the highest relative strength
cross-sectional momentum rotation across a universe

archetypes.title: Pairs / Relative-Value
archetypes.summary: Trade spread between A and B using z-score triggers.
intent_phrases: trade the spread between two correlated assets
go long one asset and short another when their spread is stretched
pairs trading based on z-score of the price ratio
relative-value mean reversion between two instruments

archetypes.title: Intermarket Trigger (Leader→Follower)
archetypes.summary: Trade follower when leader moves per trigger within a window.
intent_phrases: trade one market when another market moves first
use a leader asset to trigger trades in a follower asset
enter BTC when ETH makes a strong move, or vice versa
intermarket trigger based on a signal in a different symbol

archetypes.title: Anchored VWAP Reversion
archetypes.summary: Trade toward anchored VWAP when distance exceeds sigma threshold.
intent_phrases: fade price back toward an anchored VWAP level
buy when price is too far below anchored VWAP
sell when price runs too far above anchored VWAP
mean-reversion around an anchored VWAP after large deviations

archetypes.title: Event / Catalyst Follow-Through
archetypes.summary: Enter after a discrete catalyst within an entry window and strength filter.
intent_phrases: enter after a news event if the move continues
trade follow-through after a catalyst like earnings or macro data
buy when price continues in the direction of the event move
enter only if the post-event reaction has enough strength

archetypes.title: Gap Play (Open)
archetypes.summary: Trade session gap: gap-fade or gap-and-go with session gate.
intent_phrases: trade the gap at the session open
fade or follow opening gaps between sessions
buy when the market gaps down and then reverses
sell when the market gaps up and then fails
